item.description:
We are all energetic beings. Modern Science is proving daily that we can control our destiny by our thoughts. Going with this knowledge, where do you want to go, what do you want to be and what do you want to have? We will begin to prepare for 2110. Start collecting pictures now of what you want, what you want to achieve, the places you want to go and the activities you want to experience. By the end of the evening we will have created a personalized visualization tool that can be a kick-start to your dreams coming true.

We are excited to be showing several vision videos. It is wonderful to have a vision board and focus on the results you want. You will have even a deeper reaction to the vision video. It has confirming statments, moving pictures, and motivating music. The experience is deep and moving.

I look forward to unveiling some life changing stuff to the group.
See you there!
Barb

group.name: Abundance, Empowerment and the Law of Attraction

item.name: Vision Board, and Vision Videos- Tools for Success
